CustomField.description: Dollar variance between Q1 2026 Commit Snapshot and actual closed amount. Positive = closed above commit, Negative = closed below or didn't close.
CustomField.formula: IF( Q1_2026_Commit_Snapshot__c > 0, IF( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Stage 6. Closed(Won)"), ACV__c - Q1_2026_Commit_Snapshot__c, IF( IsClosed, 0 - Q1_2026_Commit_Snapshot__c, NULL ) ), NULL )
CustomField.label: Q1 2026 Commit Variance
